means: 最早殖民非洲南部的荷兰人称这个民族为Boschjesman
布尔战争后占据此地的英国人把这个荷兰语词改为英文Bushman

sentence.Network_en: The little Bushman looked round to make sure that nobody was there.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个小布什曼向四周望望,以弄清楚那儿确实没有人.

sentence.Network_en: The Bushman chewed off a Big piece of meat.
Bushman children play soccer in a village near the Nyae Nyae conservancy of northeastern Namibia.
sentence.Network_cn: 纳米比亚东北方向的奈奈自然保护区附近一个村子里,一群当地人的孩子正在玩足球.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年1月12日 -  作品名:丛林居民(Bushman) 形式: 印刷(Print) 公司:Publicis Espa?a 客户:国际生存组织(西班牙) 主题用语:对一名丛林居民来说,他的领地不仅仅是.
bushman 伐木工, bushman 布什曼, bushman 垦荒者
居住于的英文|居住于是什么意思|Show秀网... ... 非居住于香港的人 ： non-resident person 居住于丛林地的人 ： bushman.

entry.tran: 布须曼人（非洲西南部、尤指卡拉哈里沙漠地区的土著民族）
entry.def: A Bushman is an aboriginal person from the southwestern part of Africa, especially the Kalahari desert region.

means.word_mean: 1. a dweller in the Australian bush country

auth_sentence.content: Jumanda Gakelebone is a Bushman who said he has been harassed by the government while on the reserve.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jumanda Gakelebone is a Bushman who said he has been harassed by the government while on the reserve.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jumanda Gakelebone is a Bushman who said he has been harassed by the government while on the reserve.

auth_sentence.content: The Bushman said he hopes this time the government will uphold the decision of the court.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Bushman said he hopes this time the government will uphold the decision of the court.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Bushman said he hopes this time the government will uphold the decision of the court.
